docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Rene J. Dubos, the microbiologist and experimental pathologist, has accepted an appointment as university professor and director of environmental studies at the new State University of New York College at Purchase.

headline.main: Dubos, at 70, Will Head a State U. Ecology Unit; Rene Dubos, at 70, Direct Environmental Studies at State University College

docs.abstract: retires as prof at Rockefeller Univ to accept SUNY post on new Purchase campus as univ prof and dir of environmental studies; por
docs.snippet: Dr. Rene J. Dubos, the microbiologist and experimental pathologist, has accepted an appointment as university professor and director of environmental studies at the new State University of New York College at Purchase.
